prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a playful seal with shimmering blue fur.
Generate a Pokemon with a sleek body and icy features, perfect for swimming in the ocean.
Show me a cute aquatic creature that has a flowing tail and a friendly personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies grace and agility, with a design inspired by marine mammals.
Design a Pokemon that uses ice attacks and has a serene demeanor, suited for cold waters.
Make a cartoonish Pokemon that has a soft, rounded body and sparkly water effects.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in the sea, with elegant movements and a gentle spirit.
